original_text: But Josiah would not agree to go away. He changed his clothes so that nobody would recognize him in the battle. God had told King Necho what to say to Josiah. But Josiah would not listen to his words. Instead, he went to fight against Necho in Megiddo valley.
korean_text: 요시야가 몸을 돌이켜 떠나기를 싫어하고 오히려 변장하고 그와 싸우고자 하여 하나님의 입에서 나온 느고의 말을 듣지 아니하고 므깃도 골짜기에 이르러 싸울 때에

sentences.original_text: But Josiah would not agree to go away.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 요시야는 물러가는 것에 동의하지 않았다.

sentences.original_text: so that nobody would recognize him
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 아무도 그를 알아보지 못하게 하기 위해서였다.

sentences.original_text: God had told King Necho what to say
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 네고 왕에게 무엇을 말해야 할지 알려주셨다.

sentences.original_text: But Josiah would not listen to his words.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 요시야는 그의 말을 듣지 않았다.

sentences.original_text: Instead, he went to fight against Necho
